      • makeAction

        public int makeAction(StandardPlayingCard c1,
                      StandardPlayingCard c2)
        Applies War rules to determine the "winner" of the two cards
        Parameters:
        c1 - player 1's card
        c2 - player 2's card
        Returns:
        -1 if player 1 wins, 1 if player 2 wins

      • splitTie

        public int splitTie(StandardPlayingCard c1,
                    StandardPlayingCard c2)
        Splits ties during rounds
        Parameters:
        c1 - player 1's card
        c2 - player 2's card
        Returns:
        -1 if player 1 wins, 1 if player 2 wins, -2 if someone runs out of cards
